attributes.action: Change human rights for terrorists in prison
attributes.additional_details:
You will loose all rights once a act of terrorism has been conducted and will not be able to regain them on good behaviour, if the person commits such acts all contact with other people will be stopped until the sentence has finished.
No legal aid will be given to any suspected terrorist no matter the circumstances even found innocent.
When sentencing for a murder a group should be counted as individuals, e.g. a group of 4 killed, each life a minimum of 20years  making a 80year sentence.
attributes.background: Stop terrorist's having all contact with people. A vast majority of terrorists in the UK are converted in prison, keep them all in solitary confinement with no contact with the inmates or the outside world, no legal aid & if found guilty of murder, each life taken will be treated as a individual.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
